CodeItem.name: 代码取数
CodeItem.codeListScript: select ItemNo,ItemName from CODE_LIBRARY where CodeNo='%CodeItemName%' and IsInUse='1' order by SortNo

CodeItem.name: 证件类型
CodeItem.codeListScript: select ItemNo,ItemName from CODE_LIBRARY where codeno='CertType' and (ItemNo like 'Ent%' and '%QueryType%'='EntCustomerQuery' or ItemNo like 'Ind%' and '%QueryType%'='IndCustomerQuery' or '%QueryType%'<> 'IndCustomerQuery' and '%QueryType%'<>'EntCustomerQuery') and IsInUse='1' order by SortNo

CodeItem.name: 取业务品种
CodeItem.codeListScript: select TypeNo,TypeName from BUSINESS_TYPE where IsInUse='1' order by SortNo

CodeItem.name: 取核心科目
CodeItem.codeListScript: select SubjectNo,SubjectName from Subject_Info where Attribute3='1' order by SubjectNo

CodeItem.name: 取下属机构
CodeItem.codeListScript: select OrgID,OrgName from ORG_INFO where OrgID like '%EnvironmentOrgID%%' order by OrgID

CodeItem.name: 取机构
CodeItem.codeListScript: select OrgID,OrgName from ORG_INFO order by OrgID

CodeItem.name: 取行业类型最大项
CodeItem.codeListScript: select ItemNo,ItemName from CODE_LIBRARY where CodeNo='%CodeItemName%' and length(ItemNo)=1 order by ItemNo

CodeItem.name: 取担保方式
CodeItem.codeListScript: select ItemNo,ItemName from CODE_LIBRARY where CodeNo='%CodeItemName%' and IsInUse='1'and length(ItemNo)=3 order by ItemNo

CodeItem.name: 客户类型
CodeItem.codeListScript: select ItemNo,ItemName from CODE_LIBRARY where CodeNo='CustomerType' and ItemNo like ( CASE WHEN '%QueryType%'= 'EntCustomerQuery' THEN '01%' WHEN '%QueryType%'= 'IndCustomerQuery' THEN '03%' ELSE '0%' END ) and length(ItemNo) > 2

CodeItem.name: 四级分类
CodeItem.codeListScript: select ItemNo,ItemName from CODE_LIBRARY where codeno='BusinessStatus' and IsInUse='1' order by ItemNo

CodeItem.name: 本行信用等级
CodeItem.codeListScript: select ItemNo,ItemName from CODE_LIBRARY where codeno='CreditLevel' and IsInUse='1' order by ItemNo

CodeItem.name: 终结类型
CodeItem.codeListScript: select ItemNo,ItemName from CODE_LIBRARY where codeno='FinishType' and IsInUse='1' order by ItemNo
